## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                         | Type                                 | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `type` _(required)_ | `type`    | The user identity status (logged in or not logged in). It determines the visibility of the inner message based on the stored token. | `"customer" \| "guest" \| undefined` | `undefined` |
